name: The War Ghost
description:
The War Ghost is a visual novel about an exorcist getting ready to face his toughest rival.

In this quiet, atmospheric story, the exorcist must face his past, the march of time and the most powerful restless spirit that the world has ever known... the War Ghost.

This short Visual Novel was made for Winter VN Jam 2021.

Average playtime  is 30 minutes.
